column3: News;Phnom Penh: A CNE reader has sent images of what appears to be a massive fire somewhere around Tonle Bassac district in Phnom Penh.------Witnesses say the fire is close to AEON Mall I
column4: near the nightclub area.------Updates to follow.------Initial eyewitness accounts say the fire is at the restaurant next to Sound Club (later appears to be EDM).------UPDATE: More photos at ------KOHSANTEPHEAP
